russian_federation.name: The Russian Federation
russian_federation.info:
**Ruler** Savva Volkov
**Ruling Party** United Russia *(Yedinaya Rossiya - YR)*
**Government System** Federal dominant-party democracy under a presidential dictatorship
**Economic System** State capitalism
**Interest Groups** Party Apparatchiks, Oligarchs, Security- and Military Forces, Religious Institutions, Controlled Opposition
**Opposition** Anyone who actually believes in anything
**ForPol** Nationalist *(de-jure)*, Isolationist *(de-facto)*

komi_republic.name: The Komi Republic
komi_republic.info:
**Ruler** Fictional
**Ruling Party** Communist Party of the Russian Federation *(Kommunisticheskaya Partiya Rossiyskoy Federatsii - KPRF)*
**Government System** Semi-presidential democracy
**Economic System** State Capitalism
**Interest Groups** Different KPRF Branches, Oligarchs
**Opposition** United Russia, Natives
**ForPol** Regionalist

nenetsia.name: The Nenetsian Okrugs
nenetsia.info:
**Ruler** Fictional
**Ruling Party** United Russia *(de-jure)*, Gazprom *(de-facto)*
**Government System** Corporatocracy
**Economic System** State Capitalism
**Interest Groups** Oligarchs
**Opposition** Communist Party of the Russian Federation, Natives
**ForPol** Regionalist

southern_military_district.name: The Southern Military District
southern_military_district.info:
**Ruler** Ramzan Kadyrov
**Ruling Party** Ground Forces *(Sukhoputnyye Voyska - SV)*
**Government System** Military dictatorship
**Economic System** 'You, give me that'
**Interest Groups** Military Forces
**Opposition** United Russia, Islamists, Separatists
**ForPol** Nationalist

free_russian_government.name: The Free Russian Government
free_russian_government.info:
**Ruler** Ilya Ponomarev
**Ruling Party** Congress of People's Deputies *(S'yezd Narodnykh Deputatov - SND)*
**Government System** Unelected provisional government
**Economic System** Free-market capitalism 
**Interest Groups** Liberals, Conservatives, Nationalists, Ukrainian advisors and oligarchs
**Opposition** Left-wingers
**ForPol** Pro-Ukrainian

free_idel-ural.name: Free Idel-Ural
free_idel-ural.info:
**Ruler** İskändär Xäliulla
**Ruling Party** Idel-Ural Kurultai
**Government System** Confederation of democratic states under a military dictatorship
**Economic System** Free-market capitalism
**Interest Groups** Various Natives, Free Nations of Post-Russia Forum, Ukrainian advisors and oligarchs
**Opposition** Ethnic Russians
**ForPol** Pro-Ukrainian

democratic_government.name: The Democratic Government of the Russian Federation
democratic_government.info:
**Ruler** Fictional
**Ruling Party** Fictional
**Government System** Parliamentary democracy
**Economic System** State capitalism in transition to free-market capitalism
**Interest Groups** Socialists, Liberals, Conservatives, Nationalists, Western advisors and investors
**Opposition** Anarchists, Separatists
**ForPol** Pro-Western

omsk.name: The Omsk Council
omsk.info:
**Ruler** Regional Defense Council of Omsk
**Ruling Party** Combat Organization of Anarcho-Communists *(Boyevaya Organizatsiya Anarkho-Kommunistov - BOAK)* 
**Government System** Participatory democracy
**Economic System** Socialism
**Interest Groups** Working class
**Opposition** Middle- and upper classes
**ForPol** Regionalist

far_east.name: The Far Eastern Republic
far_east.info:
**Ruler** Ekaterina Morozova
**Ruling Party** Liberal Democratic Party of Russia *(Liberal'no-Demokraticheskaya Partiya Rossii - LDPR)*
**Government System** Presidential democracy
**Economic System** State capitalism in transition to free-market capitalism
**Interest Groups** Regionalists, Chinese and Japanese investors
**Opposition** Communist Party of the Russian Federation, Nationalists
**ForPol** Pro-Chinese
